name: 认知搜索_1跳_dataowner_cdsn453

config_info.statements:
match p=allShortestPaths((ends:datacatalog)-[e*..1]-(starts))
     where  id(starts) in {'63d6e48f0b3f6782b3e4b8b3fe57eef2','b923b1083acf2e4e58f6d8e3b0309172'} and 
         (bit_and(ends.datacatalog.data_kind, 0) > 0 or 0==0) and 
         (ends.datacatalog.asset_type in [-1]  or "[-1]"=="[-1]") and 
         (ends.datacatalog.update_cycle in [-1]    or "[-1]"=="[-1]" ) and 
         (ends.datacatalog.shared_type in [-1]   or "[-1]"=="[-1]") and 
         (ends.datacatalog.published_at >= 1600122122 or 1600122122==0) and 
         (ends.datacatalog.published_at <=  1800122122 or  1800122122==0)  and
          (ends.datacatalog.info_system_id in [-1] or "[-1]"=="[-1]") and 
          (ends.datacatalog.owner_id in [-1]  or "[-1]"=="[-1]") and 
          (ends.datacatalog.department_id in [-1]  or "[-1]"=="[-1]") and 
          (ends.datacatalog.theme_id in [-1] or "[-1]"=="[-1]") 
return p;
